title: Initial TRT consultation completed
content:
Patient completed initial consultation with Dr. Baldwin for testosterone replacement therapy. Approved for Testosterone Cypionate protocol.

Key points:
- Patient is 29yo male, very active (4-5x/week exercise)
- Primary goals: energy improvement, muscle recovery, strength optimization
- Labs confirmed low-normal total T, low free T
- Comfortable with self-injection after IM education

Prescription sent to pharmacy. Follow-up in 6 weeks for labs.

title: Insurance verification - TRT
content:
Verified patient's insurance coverage. Testosterone therapy is not covered by insurance - patient will pay out of pocket.

Payment method on file: VISA ending in 4242
Every 10 weeks cost: $89 for Testosterone Cypionate 10mL vial

title: Added Semaglutide for body composition
content:
Patient returned for weight management consultation. Adding low-dose Semaglutide to support body composition goals while maintaining muscle mass.

Starting dose: 0.25mg weekly
Goal: Reduce body fat while preserving lean mass from resistance training

Patient educated on injection rotation, protein intake requirements, and potential GI side effects.

title: Patient reports improved energy
content:
Patient messaged reporting improved energy levels since starting testosterone therapy. Also notes faster recovery between workouts and better motivation. No injection site reactions or side effects reported.

Will continue current protocol and recheck labs at 6-week mark.

title: Treatment plan initiated
content:
Started patient on Finasteride 1mg daily for hair loss treatment. Discussed expected timeline for results (3-6 months for visible improvement).

Side effects reviewed:
- Decreased libido (rare)
- Must not handle crushed tablets if pregnant

Patient acknowledged understanding and signed consent form. Will follow up in 3 months to assess progress.

title: 3-month follow-up - good response
content:
Patient reports early signs of improvement. Less hair shedding noted in the shower and on pillowcase. No side effects experienced.

Progress photos taken and compared to baseline - slight improvement in crown area density visible.

Plan: Continue current treatment. Add topical Minoxidil 5% if patient interested in accelerating results. Patient will consider and follow up.

title: Biotin inquiry resolved
content: Patient called asking about combining Finasteride with biotin supplements. Advised that biotin is safe to take alongside Finasteride and may provide additional support for hair health. No prescription needed for biotin.

title: Added Minoxidil to regimen
content:
Patient decided to add Minoxidil 5% solution to treatment regimen. Discussed expected temporary shedding phase in first 2-4 weeks.

Instructions: Apply to dry scalp BID (morning and evening).

title: New patient intake received
content:
New patient registration received for sexual wellness consultation. Patient has submitted order for Sildenafil 50mg.

Status: Awaiting provider review
Questionnaire: Pending completion

title: Reminder sent for questionnaire
content: Automated reminder sent to patient to complete medical questionnaire. Required before provider can review consultation request.
